forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: A chance of snow before 10pm, then a slight chance of rain between 10pm and 11pm, then a slight chance of snow between 11pm and 5am, then a slight chance of rain. Cloudy. Low around 30, with temperatures rising to around 35 overnight. Southwest wind 7 to 10 mph, with gusts as high as 26 mph. Chance of precipitation is 30%.
